Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2018 05:30AM Ateague5 wrote: I am so sorry you are going though it. I am so super scared and worried. I look at my girls and I can't hold it together. I have to find a way to remain calm until it comes back.
Posts.Title: Worried Ateague5 Ateague5

Posts.Content: Ateague5 wrote: Hello, I am 40 and had a bad mammo yesterday with two suspicious spots found. I had a ultrasound and after 25 min and 3 people trying to find the spots on the Mammo they did. He said it was irregular and I have to have a biopsy. The other one is round and he is notconcerned. I am so scared. He rated me a 4b on the biraid scale. My anxiety is bad I can't stop crying. I don't know any family history. They can't get me in for biopsy for a week. I am trying to stay focused but can't. Everyone keeps reminding me they are mostly benign but the irregular shape has me so freaked out. I feel awful many ofyou are diagnosed and I probably sound silly but my anxiety is awful Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried Ateague5 Ateague5

Posts.Content: Aug 28, 2018 07:43PM Ateague5 wrote: Thank you for your kind words. I am just so scared. I don't even know what all this means. I've never worried. I had no lumps and just had a mammo and boom
Posts.Title: Worried Ateague5 Ateague5

Posts.Content: Ateague5 wrote: hello everyone, The past two weeks have been one of the scariest times in my life. I came here looking for support and information and found it when I needed it.My journey ended this afternoon with a call from my radiologist telling me my biopsy was benign. I am cancer free. I wanted to post this because I looked for these posts and found comfort with the posts that showed a higher biraid that still came back benign. This community is amazing and I was blessed to find y'all. I want to check in on this community and remain part. Y'all seen dear to my heart. Thank you Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: BIRAID 4b Ateague5 Dani444
